body_html:
The 3rd error can be solved by downgrading GCC version to 6 instead of current 7.3.0. Check #8788 .

However, I still prefer building Pytorch with this ENV:
Ubuntu 18.04 + gcc (Ubuntu 7.3.0-16ubuntu3) 7.3.0 + Python 3.6.5

As for the third_party submodules, is it possible for me to just ignore all ?

Cheers
Pei
body_text:
The 3rd error can be solved by downgrading GCC version to 6 instead of current 7.3.0.  Check #8788 .
However, I still prefer building Pytorch with this ENV:
Ubuntu 18.04 + gcc (Ubuntu 7.3.0-16ubuntu3) 7.3.0 +  Python 3.6.5
As for the third_party submodules, is it possible for me to just ignore all ?
Cheers

body:
The 3rd error can be solved by downgrading GCC version to 6 instead of current 7.3.0.  Check [https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8788](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8788) .

However, I still prefer building Pytorch with this ENV:
**Ubuntu 18.04 + gcc (Ubuntu 7.3.0-16ubuntu3) 7.3.0 +  Python 3.6.5**

As for the third_party submodules, is it possible for me to just ignore all ?

Cheers
Pei
